messages.title: Asia-Pacific Island and Littoral Studies
messages.subtitle: 亞太島嶼與沿海研究期刊
messages.description: “Asia-Pacific Island and Littoral Studies” (APILS) is an open-access online journal, which aims to promote knowledge on the islands and litorals of the Asia-Pacific regions in all areas that relate to the Humanities and Social Sciences.
messages.author: @simonwiles
